name: E-commerce Checkout Flow Test
description: Test a complete e-commerce checkout process on a demo site - demonstrates complex multi-step workflows
requirements:
Complete a full purchase flow on the Sauce Demo e-commerce site:
1. Login with credentials (username: standard_user, password: secret_sauce)
2. Browse the product catalog
3. Add 2-3 items to the shopping cart
4. View the shopping cart and verify items
5. Proceed to checkout
6. Fill in shipping information (First: Test, Last: User, Zip: 12345)
7. Review order summary
8. Complete the purchase
9. Verify order confirmation message
expected_outcomes: Login page loads with username and password fields
After login, product catalog page is displayed
Products show images, names, prices, and 'Add to cart' buttons
Cart badge updates when items are added
Cart page shows all added items with quantities and prices
Order summary shows items, subtotal, tax, and total
notes: This uses saucedemo.com, a public demo site specifically designed for testing automation tools
